SELECT team_code teamCode, team_name teamName, team_des teamDes, parent_team_code parentTeamCode, team_create_date teamCreateDate, team_update_date teamUpdateDate FROM team WHERE team_code != 10 LIMIT ${startRow}, ${rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team WHERE team_code != 10
SELECT team_code id, parent_team_code parentId, CASE WHEN team_name = 'GAEnt.' THEN '대표이사' ELSE team_name END AS name, team_eng_name des FROM team ORDER BY team_code;

SELECT e.emp_code empCode, t.team_code teamCode, t.team_name teamName, t.parent_team_code parentTeamCode, e.rank_code rankCode, e.emp_profile profile, e.emp_id empId, e.emp_pw empPw, e.emp_kor_name korName, e.emp_eng_name engName, e.emp_reg_no regNo, e.emp_gender gender, e.emp_phone phone, e.emergency_phone_relation emergencyPhoneRelation, e.emergency_phone emergencyPhone, e.post_code postCode, e.address address, e.detail_address detailAddress, e.total_leave totalLeave, e.use_leave useLeave, e.emp_ext ext, e.emp_hire_date hireDate, e.emp_resign_date resignDate, e.emp_update_date updateDate, e.final_modifier finalModifier FROM emp e LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON e.team_code = t.team_code WHERE e.emp_code = #{empCode}
SELECT t.team_code teamCode, t.team_name teamName, t.team_des teamDes, e.emp_kor_name empName FROM team t JOIN emp e ON t.team_code = e.team_code WHERE t.team_code = #{teamCode} AND e.rank_code = 2
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emp WHERE LEFT(team_code, 1) = LEFT(#{teamCode}, 1) AND team_code != '10'

SELECT t.team_name AS teamName, t.team_des AS teamDes, e.emp_kor_name AS empName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emp WHERE team_code = t.team_code) AS cnt FROM team t JOIN emp e ON t.team_code = e.team_code WHERE t.parent_team_code = #{teamCode} AND e.rank_code = 3

SELECT t.team_code teamCode, t.team_name teamName, t.team_des teamDes, e.emp_kor_name empName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emp WHERE team_code = t.team_code) AS cnt FROM team t JOIN emp e ON t.team_code = e.team_code WHERE t.team_code = #{teamCode} AND e.rank_code = 3

SELECT emp_code empCode, team_code teamCode, emp_kor_name empName, CASE rank_code WHEN 1 THEN '대표이사' WHEN 2 THEN '부장' WHEN 3 THEN '팀장' WHEN 4 THEN '대리' WHEN 5 THEN '사원' ELSE '기타' END as rank, CONCAT( SUBSTRING(emp_phone, 1, 3), '-', SUBSTRING(emp_phone, 4, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(emp_phone, 8, 4) ) phone, emp_id email, emp_ext ext, emp_profile profile FROM emp WHERE team_code = #{teamCode} ORDER BY rank_code, empName LIMIT ${startRow}, ${rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emp WHERE team_code = #{teamCode}
SELECT team_code teamCode, team_name teamName, parent_team_code parentTeamCode, team_des teamDes FROM team WHERE team_code = #{teamCode}
